subject: Re: [junit] JUnit 4.8.1 is released: bug fix
msgSnippet: Last time, some kind soul pushed 4.7 into the Maven repo. Thanks whoever that was! If you have time to upload the request for 4.8.1 I know I would greatly
messageBody:
Last time, some kind soul pushed 4.7 into the Maven repo.
Thanks whoever that was! If you have time to upload the
request for 4.8.1 I know I would greatly appreciate it.

Thanks, Paul.

David Saff wrote:
>
>
> JUnit 4.8.1 has been released, fixing major bugs in the documentation
> and implementation of categories. Thanks to our users for being on
> top of things.
>
> http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/doc/ReleaseNotes4.8.1.html
> <http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/doc/ReleaseNotes4.8.1.html>
>
> and the javadoc at
>
> http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/javadoc/4.8.1/
> <http://kentbeck.github.com/junit/javadoc/4.8.1/>
>
> and download from
>
> http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/downloads
> <http://github.com/KentBeck/junit/downloads>
>
> Share and Enjoy,
>
> David Saff
>
>
